Server.Controller

Class ServerCommunicationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.Controller.ServerCommunicationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerCommunicationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The purpose of this class is to handle the input from the client side and return the appropriate response
    Author:
    Michael Vassilev 30068475, Vic Phan 30061885, Sebastian Contreras 30062418

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerCommunicationController(java.net.Socket socket, DBController database)
      constructs an instance of ServerCommunicationController which initializes the input and output readers of the server side

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCourseToStudent(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String courseNum, java.lang.String ID)
      this method registers the user into a given course by first checking if the given course is in the database, after which the student is registered and the confirmation is sent to the client side in String form
      void communicate()
      this method continuously communicates with the client and processes the information sent from there
      void removeCourseFromStudent(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String courseNum, java.lang.String ID)
      this method removes a student from the given course by first checking if the course is available, after which the student is removed from the course and the confirmation is sent back to the client in String form
      void run() 
      void searchForCourse(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String courseNum)
      this method searches for the given course in the course catalogue, sending the confirmation back to the client in String form
      void viewAllCourses()
      this method gets all the courses in the database and sends them to the client side in String form
      void viewStudentCourse(java.lang.String ID)
      this method gets all the courses the current user is registered for and sends them to the client side in String form

        public void removeCourseFromStudent(java.lang.String courseName,
                                    java.lang.String courseNum,
                                    java.lang.String ID)
        this method removes a student from the given course by first checking if the course is available, after which the student is removed from the course and the confirmation is sent back to the client in String form
        Parameters:
        courseName, - the name of the course the user is getting out of
        courseNum, - the number of the course the user is getting out of
        ID, - the id of the user

      • addCourseToStudent

        public void addCourseToStudent(java.lang.String courseName,
                               java.lang.String courseNum,
                               java.lang.String ID)
        this method registers the user into a given course by first checking if the given course is in the database, after which the student is registered and the confirmation is sent to the client side in String form
        Parameters:
        courseName, - the name of the course the student is trying to register for
        courseNum, - the number of the course the student is trying to register for
        ID, - the id of the student/user
